## Description {#details}

An abstract interface for memory access kind related attributes (readnone/readonly/writeonly).

Definition at line 4635 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.

## Enumerations

### anonymous enum  {#a79d67102092193edc6d431f35cdb072d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">
State encoding bits.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a79d67102092193edc6d431f35cdb072da968857ad600f95aa7d356e09c065c64f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NO_READS">
 (= 1 &lt;&lt; 0)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a79d67102092193edc6d431f35cdb072da855b6c4a37d05f98826cad5d6c26cb14" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NO_WRITES">
 (= 1 &lt;&lt; 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a79d67102092193edc6d431f35cdb072da99fd7a59be55148bc3363d90453cc368" />
<EnumerationListItem name="NO_ACCESSES">
 (= NO&#95;READS | NO&#95;WRITES)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a79d67102092193edc6d431f35cdb072da6b8577d14abbaf2ef84df4df30780f1b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="BEST_STATE">
 (= NO&#95;ACCESSES)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

A set bit in the state means the property holds. BEST&#95;STATE is the best possible state, 0 the worst possible state.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l04654">4654</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
